page.title: 15INCORPORATION OF STRAW
page.content: Farms are doing a lot of work on straw incorporation and this method of disposal is being used increasingly. It is not a quick or cheap method of disposal, to achive the best incorporation the straw needs to be {chopped finely}and this is done either with a chopper on the back of a combine or by a separate machine drawn by a tractor. At the same time it needs to be spread widely across the field and incorporated as soon as possible. The important element is thoroughly mixing the straw with the soil. Loss of production results from straw incorporation, the farmer is faced with{capital expenditure}on extra machinery, added manpower and fuel costs and a delay in getting on to the land to start autumn drilling and at the moment no clear idea of the long term effect on the land.
